website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot A2000 IS is lean on features beyond its stabilized 6x zoom lens, but it takes great photos and is easy to use.
pros: Excellent photo quality for the money

customer_reviews.title: NIce Camera, but not very survivable.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my first Canon Powershot A2000IS 10MP Digital Camera. So, when the battery compartment door would no longer stay tight enough for the camera to run, I blamed myself for letting the camera drop to the floor. Considering myself to be at fault, I bought a second one. I loved this camera as well. I got about 5 months out of this camera, when the battery door loosened and the camera would not stay on. Again. This time, I had taken care not to bump or thump the camera around. But when the camera worked, it was exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J. Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Great pictures
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these cameras for years. I carried it with me everywhere and took thousands of great pictures. It was dropped more than once. Amazed it worked as long as it did. The battery door wore out and I had to use tape to hold it shut but it still worked. I finally lost it while kayaking down the river. This is the best camera for quick easy shots and great pictures. I am just as happy with this one as I was with my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A20001S
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller digital camera that would still have the clarity (10MP) and also a good zoom lense (6X). This little Canon Powershot provided me with just that. It seemed I never had my larger camera available whenever something came up that I wanted a picture of. I checked Amazon and found this little Canon Powershot. It takes excellent and clear pictures, and the 6X zoom lense brings in the scenary and wildlife shots to give me beautiful pictures. I would recommend this camera to anyone with similar needs as it is small enough to carry in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Laurlie P

customer_reviews.title: Canon Fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace the beloved A 720 I drowned when I fell into a lake in Desolation Wilderness. I have been especially impressed with the A 2000's more compact size -- even while it retains most of the features that so endeared me to the predecessor. - I especially like the big ZOOM, the high pixels, the ample screen, the ability to use rechargable off-the-shelf batteries. - I'm still getting used to the new proportions of the pictures and the lack of a viewfinder. Strongly recommend this camera for any avid gran'pa's general-purpose, high-volume use on smaller, constantly-moving subjects.
customer_reviews.author: R. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A2000IS
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Canon Powershot A2000S digital camera. I find it to be very easy to use and the instructions are easy to understand. I was surprised to see how great the pictures came out. The camera is great with downloading on the computer. Again, very easy to use. I am pleased with the camera and am glad I purchased it. Since I have nor had any photography experience, this camera was just the thing for me because it is so simple to use. I would recommend this camera to anyone who wants to have fun taking pictures without the hassle of trying to figure out how to use a camera!
customer_reviews.author: R.F.

customer_reviews.title: This Camera is Reefers Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: Canon got it just right. I got this camera for pretty much for the sole reason for use of taking pictures of saltwater fish tank, where MH, T5, and other lighting source that is blue. Many other camera have options that you have to play around with to get the white balance correct. Canon has a "custom" white balance that is a matter of a click of a button and it auto adjust. Ive taken this camera to 2 local fish(reef) store and they were sold on it and wanted to know where they can buy one. As many reefers know great true image of your livestock sell your corals and this camera paid for itself.
customer_reviews.author: L.T.L

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for standard everyday usage
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice price, easy-to-use (both camera and software), convenient in hand, small size. Better zoom and response times than on my previous camera. Cons: Hard to see the screen in bright daylight. And no viewfinder to compensate this. Less settings (presets) than on my previous Powershot A85 (and sometimes I really miss them). Image quality rapidly drops in low-light scenes (dim indoor light, night scenes outdoors). And not much presets to compensate this.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I got three.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third of this model I have purchased. I loved the first one, which I lost. I loved the second one, which was stolen. I bought a different camera after that happened, used it a week and hated it. Went online and ordered another Canon Powershot and couldn't be happier. It's the right size for my hands, has logical settings, takes great pictures and video. What more can you ask?
customer_reviews.author: Carol Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great little machine
customer_reviews.text: This camera was top rated by Consumer Reports and Amazon had the best price. I can't wait to use it this fall when I got on a road trip. My son is a professional freelance photographer in Russia with an expensive digital camera and he was very impressed with the Powershot. I compared others in this price range and this one came out on top, easy to use and connect the software to my older computer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pakula

customer_reviews.title: Top notch digital camera.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner at photography. Before buying, I did quite a bit of research. The camera works beautifully - it even has a "dummy" setting for beginners. The images are crisp and clear - insurance photos of my books showed all the titles clearly. The associated software works well on my Mac. I'm looking forward to entering the digital age of photography.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, small camera
customer_reviews.text: Good little camera. The pictures are not what you get with a very expensive camera, but for my needs, it was perfect...small, lightweight, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lusher

customer_reviews.title: works great ...... great for carrying with you everywhere
customer_reviews.text: for the price could not have gone wrong by getting the canon i reviewed many before making the choice of going with another canon camera this camera replaced a older model which the lense quit working i was thinking of going with a different brand until reading the reviews on the ones i wanted and decided for the price i could not go wrong by getting the canon
customer_reviews.author: R. Conn

customer_reviews.title: Needs a view finder
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera. Best zoom I have ever used on a point-and shoot and the image stabilization if a life saver. My only objection is lack of a viewfinder. The large view screen is great in most situations, but when the sun is bright or shining on the screen, it is useless. At that point, I zoom out to ensure getting all the subject and crop on the computer later. That said, this is a wonderful camera for the money. I still recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: wouldworker

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot
customer_reviews.text: One of the latest versions of the never ending upgrade projects. This was purchased as a gift for a family member. Purchase was primarily based on the reputation and past use of the Canon product line. So far all is good, great optics, ease of use, battery life, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is not an ultra-compact, but small enough for easy transport. Can be put in pants pocket. 6x zoom and image stability awesome! Great photos for the price; obviously cannot compete for picture quality with high-end expensive cameras. Great for everyday use. Versatile. Easy to use. Only negative is the flash has a long recharge time between pics... something like 6-7 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: King Lou

customer_reviews.title: This Canon camera is the overall worst camera I ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Zoom didn't work, pictures were not sharp, card was "locked", menus were difficult to navigate, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Huey

customer_reviews.title: My favorite camera I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the best one I have ever owned. The pictures are crystal-clear. I took a picture of my son spraying me with the water hose and the camera captured each individual twinkling droplet of water as well as his ornery face behind the water. This camera is light-weight and easy to use. I love the zoom-quality, too. Pictures that I take far away are just as clear as ones up close. The price is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cannon Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good camera. Pros:- Photo quality is awsome. The videos are far better then any other camera I had. It is so simple even my kids can handle it. Cons:- The shutter speed is really slow. It is solid 4-5 secs between 3 picture no matter how much u adjust the speed. The battery lid cannot take too much impact. If you drop the camera once or twice then the lid hinge gets loose and it won't hold the battery weight, you need to press the lid with your thumb in order to have the power. Overall a really good buy...
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Another great Canon camera
customer_reviews.text: This Powershot 2000IS was purchased as a birthday gift for my husband, to replace an older version of the same model. He wanted the greater optical zoom feature. The camera is easy to operate and takes excellent pictures.
customer_reviews.author: C. Van Hest

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera such a joy to use and the pictures are great
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C. Robbelamazon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera, womderful price
customer_reviews.text: The canon A2000is is hands down a wonderful point and shoot camera. The 6x zoom is wonderful for getting close up shots. The convenience of AA batteries is comforting in the extreme (no hunting for outdated proprietary batteries on the internet in 5 years). The documentation is fairly robust and understandable for a novice. The LCD is large and is still viewable in very bright light. The menu and modes are fairly simple to navigate, moreso if one reads some of the helpful reviews here. Overall a great camera. I'm extremely pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wierd Beard

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera
customer_reviews.text: Really a four and a half stars. Lots of goodies on this one. Great optical zoom! Battery lasts a long time. Easy to use. Guys with big hands will find it easier to use than smaller pocket-sized cameras. Nice sized screen. Only real drawback is the delay after taking a shot, which makes it very difficult to take shots in rapid succession.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha D

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera - Amazing Resolution
customer_reviews.text: If you told me 2 years I would be able to take pictures like this with a digital camera I would have told you that you were crazy. The quality of the pictures I am taking with this little point and shoot camera is amazing. The auto settings are great. It's almost not worth tweaking the settings unless you are going for a specific effect.
customer_reviews.author: Boone Helm

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly but disappointed with flash recharge time
customer_reviews.text: Camera works perfectly in all aspects, but the flash recovery time is disappointing. It takes atleast 4 to 5 seconds with eneloop rechargeable batteries and some photo size settings. Over all a good camera if you take few pictures at night
customer_reviews.author: Ilani

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: When my first A2000IS went into the pool "accidentally" I searched and found another one immediately. Very happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures, bought to share with the family and everyone is able to use it and get good shots. Have it on vacation next couple weeks and taking lots of great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Camera did not work. Sent back because it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera did not work. Sent back because it would not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this camera for a short period but it takes super clear pictures on the auto setting. Still have some learning to do to learn all the other options. The display is great and easy to see. I up graded the memory card to an 8GB card and it holds over 2,000 photographs!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Canon A2000 is
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, all that I would expect from Canon! The size is right; balance is good and loaded with features. The zoom and AE features get the job done and it is a pleasure to carry. I'm completely satisfied and would not hesitate to recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RH NJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera !!
customer_reviews.text: I would HIGHLY reccomend this camera. It has a setting for everything and the hassle free auto mode makes picture taking a snap. I really like the professional results and the ability to use situation specific settings. This camera has it all and video too !!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Oehlert

customer_reviews.title: Love this classic camera
customer_reviews.text: Canon makes the best cameras I have three and would not by another brand. The clarity is unbelievable when compared to another make.
customer_reviews.author: lumi41

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING Price/Value Ratio !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Every day they make them more affordable and with more high end features, you can't go wrong with CANON
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful and I can actually use it, and not screw it up. YEAH!
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A2000IS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife's birthday. It was competitively priced, well packaged and shipped promptly. She is very pleased with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ray C. Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: one of my best purchases  ever!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at this little camera. I originally got for it for my son to learn photography -but am actually. Keeping it fir myself (lol)
customer_reviews.author: loridavis

customer_reviews.title: Good digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. It is simple to operate. The directions are clear. I could not use the program to load pictures to my pc. I used the Mac IPhoto program instead and it is fine. I would recommend the Canon Powershot A2000IS.
customer_reviews.author: H. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice photos
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera for a few years. It still works well and has quite a few photo enhancing perks. I tend to just take photos on a manual setting. If I were a serious photographer I would want a higher zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Squeaker68

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a month now. Im not completely thrilled with it. My biggest regret is how it takes couple seconds to think before it allows you take another picture. Its worse in low lighting pictures. Other than that its a very good camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mataia

customer_reviews.title: Great camera all around!
customer_reviews.text: A great camera all around, and it takes really nice videos too! It is very easy to use, and I purchased it because consumer reports magazine gives it a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Victoreen

customer_reviews.title: Canon A2000IS Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Have had several digital cameras and this one is by far the best in it's price range. Steady shot is great and picture quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: MIRAGE

customer_reviews.title: Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent digital camera, the best camera I have ever owned, would recommend it to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Moparmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Not so hot
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginner. Got good reviews from the Pros, but Manual controls very limited and I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Whitman

customer_reviews.title: really is a point &shoot
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes very good photos. However the features advertised are absent. It is really just a point and shoot. It turns out to be OK for the pictures I take but anyone expecting more will be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: John B. Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: One Year Later
customer_reviews.text: One year and three weeks after I purchased this camera it stopped working. It had been working well until this point. The battery is fully charged. Of course the warranty is up. The camera won't turn on! This camera had come highly recommended and I was very satisfied with it - I had another model of Canon before this and also had problems which is what prompted me to buy this camera. This is the last Canon I will ever purchase. I paid $200 for it and should have gotten way more than one year out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alliegorie

customer_reviews.title: Slow charge time for flash between shots
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are great, but unfortunately the time in between shots that the camera takes to charge the flash is unbearable. It is not practical for our needs. We were not expecting DSLR speed between shots we were expecting the same time as our older Canon A95.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Camera review
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera! I researched quite a bit in looking for my perfect camera. This is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer J. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: functions ok; viewer has 2 black blotches that obscures ...
customer_reviews.text: functions ok; viewer has 2 black blotches that obscures viewing but does not distort the actual photo. caption on the ad indicated "mint" condition...
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Frechette

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very easy to use, has a huge LCD for easy viewing...great value overall, and the zoom is bigger and better than on most small digitals. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Orsi Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot A2000IS 10MP Digital Camera with 6X Optical image
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a new camera like this and loved it but dropped it in a lake. This "used" camera did not last long and I had to buy a new camera. So much for "used" cameras!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Barton

customer_reviews.title: still getting use to it
customer_reviews.text: We just got the camera and I am still trying to work it correctly. I took a lot of pictures on Vacation but have not developed any yet
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Vicki L. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par
customer_reviews.text: I thought this 10 meg camera would blow my old Casio 5 meg out of the water! Wrong.... The zoom was nice but everything else is sub par. I returned it and purchased another cheap Casio with 8 meg. The doulble A batteries are nice except they take a full 4-5 seconds to recharge the flash. I am not a huge camera guy by any means. I keep a small easy to use camera. Pictures taken with my old Casio looked better than with this new Canon. And yes I had it on the high resolution. Save your money and buy a cheap little Casio for a great general purpose camera.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Expect ot pay more
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disapointed with the memory card provided with the camera. Will take about eleven pics and that's it. Be prepared to spend another $15.00 to #20.00 for a 2 or 8GB memory card. The 32 mb memory card that comes with the camera will allow you to take 11 pics and thats it.
customer_reviews.author: OLDER THAN DIRT

product_meta.title: Canon Powershot A2000IS 10MP Digital Camera with 6x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Inside its sleek, pared down design, the top-of-the-line PowerShot A2000 IS is packed with easy-to-use features. Youve got a 10.0-megapixel resolution and a 6x optical zoom with Optical Image Stabilizer for big, beautiful prints and superb stability. To keep subjects looking their best, the DIGIC III Image Processor with Canon Face Detection handles the technical details -- automatically. Easy Mode allows you to concentrate on your scene, while Easy Playback lets you screen your images on a super-sized 3.0- inch LCD. 

PowerShot A2000IS Highlights 

Loaded with features, packed with value
A 10.0 Megapixel resolution makes it a breeze to print large size images with clarity and detail. With the PowerShot A2000 IS, dramatic, personal pictures have never been easier to shoot and share. This 10.0-megapixel camera lets you create impressive large photos of family and friends youll be proud display. The high-resolution images taken by the A2000 IS can be enlarged up to 13 x 19-inches. 

Get closer with the zoom power
The PowerShot A2000 IS has a 6x optical zoom lens that makes it easy to get the inspiring, emotive close-ups that will make your images lasting keepsakes. This magnificent lens gives you the power to shoot distant subjects with razor-sharp precision and stunning lifelike color. So you can brilliantly capture a bird high atop a tree, a childs winning goal from across the stadium or a school play from the last row. Plus, thanks to Canons highly sophisticated Optical Image Stabilizer technology, even at maximum zoom, every image is rock steady. 

The A2000 IS is equipped with Canons acclaimed Optical Image Stabilizer Technology that automatically detects and corrects camera shake -- one of the leading causes of fuzzy or blurred shots. Even when zoomed in, you can get the steady, crisp, brilliant images youll be proud to shoot and share. And Canons Optical Image Stabilizer Technology is so convenient to use. It functions perfectly with or without a flash. 

New slim two-tone design with a large, bright 3.0-inch LCD
The PowerShot A2000 IS is a digital camera that redefines the meaning of elegance -- with every exquisite detail. Note the distinctive wedge-shaped body and slim silhouette that makes this sleek, top-of-the-line A-series model as delightful to hold as it is to shoot. Then theres the two-tone styling that even at first glance, sets the A2000 IS apart from the rest. For comfort and convenience, large-sized buttons are intelligently laid out for quick and easy access. Finally, theres the high-quality matte finish around the controls that quietly, yet unmistakably, signals that this is camera like no other. 

DIGIC III Image Processor
With DIGIC III, your images boast superior quality, the camera operates at top efficiency and battery life is enhanced. Whats more, DIGIC III enables Canons Face Detection, Motion Detection Technologies and Red-eye Correction to give you better, more true-to-life people shots. Simply press the shutter button halfway down, and the camera automatically pinpoints the faces in the scene and chooses the ideal focus point. The camera controls exposure settings and flash to keep every face looking bright and natural. The camera also selects and sets the optimal exposure and ISO settings automatically to keep everything looking sharp and clear. Red-eye Correction can be handled in-camera, in two ways. The Red-eye Correction during shooting uses the Face Detection Technology to recognize and remove red-eye from images as they're taken, before the file is written to the memory card. It's also possible to correct red-eye during image playback, using simple settings in the PowerShot A2000 IS's menu. 

iSAPS Technology is an entirely original scene-recognition technology developed for digital cameras by Canon. Using an internal database of thousands of different photos, iSAPS works with the fast DIGIC III Image Processor to improve focus speed and accuracy, as well as exposure and white balance. 

DIGIC III features Face Detection technologies, giving you the best possible results in any shooting situation. Face Detection AF/AE sets the focus point and exposure for the faces of your subjects. Face Detection FE adjusts the flash to correctly illuminate your subject to provide the best balance between your subject and the overall scene, eliminating the common problems of over and underexposed faces. 

Face Detection WB means the camera concentrates upon faces when calculating white balance for the best possible skin tones. Face Select and Track lets you highlight one face among several in a scene, and the camera concentrates on that person, even as they move around the scene. Face Detection Technology is a powerful contributing factor in Canon's Motion Detection Technology. Simply press the Face Selector Button, then the selected face is double-framed and tracked when the face moves in the frame. 

Motion Detection Technology works in the background to instantly evaluate how fast your subject is moving. It automatically selects and sets the optimal exposure and ISO settings to keep everything looking sharp and clear. This feature provides higher ISOs when you need it for action-stopping shutter speeds. But when no movement is detected, it sets lower ISOs for excellent color and detail. Life doesnt give you second chances to capture special times. Thats why the PowerShot A2000 IS features ISO 1600 and High ISO Auto settings that reduce the effects of camera shake and sharpen subjects in low-light situations, giving you greater shooting flexibility. 

Red-eye Correction provides three options for removing red-eye from subjects in flash pictures.
1) The Red-eye Correction during shooting actually identifies and corrects red-eye in human subjects as pictures are taken.
2) The A2000 IS can be set to automatically detect and correct red-eye during image playback.
3) You can manually locate any red eyes in a scene during image playback on the LCD screen, and command the camera to remove them. 

Easy Mode and Easy Playback mode
When youre taking pictures, the only thing you want to think about is your subject. Thats why the PowerShot A2000 IS is equipped with Canons Easy Mode that works in the background to handle all the technical details for you. Now you can relax and concentrate on choosing just the right angle, capturing the perfect expression, framing your shot perfectly. To make showing off your images just as carefree, the A2000 IS features the new Easy Playback mode that makes viewing single images and slideshows on the camera effortless -- even if youre new to digital photography! 

The Complete Print Solution
Print/Share Button for easy direct printing and downloading, plus ID Photo Print and Movie Print with select PIXMA Photo Printers and SELPHY Compact Photo Printers. The PowerShot A2000 IS's Print/Share button makes direct printing easier than ever. Simply connect the A2000 IS to a Canon PIXMA Photo Printer or SELPHY Compact Photo Printer or any PictBridge compatible photo printer, press the lighted Print/Share button and print! Also use the Print/Share button to transfer images to a computer (Windows and Macintosh). 

Print your own ID photos in up to 28 different sizes or use the Movie Print function to output multiple stills from a recorded movie on a single sheet with a Canon SELPHY Compact Photo Printer.
feature_bullets: 10-megapixel image sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 13 x 19-inch prints
DIGIC III Image Processor with Genuine Canon Face Detection
3.0-inch LCD screen; Motion Detection technology and Red-eye Correction
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars139 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
